title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. I interviewed at INTEGRIS Health
Interview Descriptions: After application, interview scheduled within the next week with nurse manager at job fair. Staff very friendly. Inquired about nursing present and future goals in nursing. I was hired on the spot after initial interview.
Interview Questions: The interview process was very straight forward. Asked basic scenario questions regarding working with a difficult employee and how would you solve the situation to ensure a positive teamwork environment

title: Graduate Student Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at INTEGRIS Health (Oklahoma City, OK) in Nov 2022
Interview Descriptions: Good easy going, laid back nurse manager and supervisor asked questions about experience and desire to work and basic interview questions about work ethics and questionable situations at prior work
Interview Questions: Basic questions of how you would contribute

title: Radiologic Technologist Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. I interviewed at INTEGRIS Health (Oklahoma City, OK) in Nov 2022
Interview Descriptions: Just had a quick chat with the manager. Somewhat informal. Talked with the recruiter and I filled out my info and got hired on. Had to go to multiple different websites and get a background check.
Interview Questions: What college I was attending and when my anticipated graduation date was

title: Patient Service Representative Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at INTEGRIS Health
Interview Descriptions: It was simple  but very easy they ask  a lot of questions pertaining to your current roll job experience. They give you scenarios that are applicable to the job you are applying for. They often engage with follow questions to your answers they are quiet nice.
Interview Questions: N/A

title: Facial Plastic Surgeon Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at INTEGRIS Health (Edmond, OK) in May 2022
Interview Descriptions: Initial in person interview. You must reach out on your own to schedule a day of shadowing. After the shadowing I was required to reach out to them to tell if I was still interested or not.
Interview Questions: Did not really ask questions in the interviews just explained the job.

title: HUC Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 days. I interviewed at INTEGRIS Health (Oklahoma City, OK) in Feb 2022
Interview Descriptions: Shadowed with a HUC for a little to make sure the job fit. I loved it and did a in person interview with the nurse manager that was amazing! Very easy interview  process.
Interview Questions: What did you like about your Shadowing.

title: Office Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1+ week. I interviewed at INTEGRIS Health (Oklahoma City, OK) in May 2021
Interview Descriptions: Pleasant interview.  The questions were deatailed yet necessary to find the right person for the position.  I felt comfortable and was not made to feel inferior.  The position required someone to sit for extended periods of time in a small area with other employees.  We both knew that I was not the right person for this job because I do my best when I am allowed to move about and not sitting for long periods of time.  I appreciate the interviewer and her kindness and understanding.  She stated when everyone is doing what they enjoy, we al win. I agree! She advised me to continue looking for the most appropriate job for myself, within the company.  she said I would be a good fit.
Interview Questions: Would I be okay with sitting in such a small space (reception area) with two or three other co-workers?

title: Certified Nursing Assistant CNA Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at INTEGRIS Health
Interview Descriptions: It was like any other interview process/ There was an interview and on the job training offered to me. I was still in school and they needed someone urgently so I  had to decline.
Interview Questions: Why do you want to work for Integris?

title: Case Management Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at INTEGRIS Health (Oklahoma City, OK) in Apr 2020
Interview Descriptions: I  met with interviewer.Everyone is very nice. It was a little different due to the Covid 19 pandemic. The interview was 1:1. I was not chosen as a candidate but the interview experience was practice.
Interview Questions: What are your strengths

title: Patient Service Representative Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at INTEGRIS Health
Interview Descriptions: My interview was one on one with hiring manager. It was conversational . It was quick and I also took a tour before leaving. She answered  all my questions.
Interview Questions: Give a time where you had an upset customer.  How did you handle it?

title: Nursing Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at INTEGRIS Health
Interview Descriptions: Applied online, received a call to set up an interview the same week.  The online application was easy, had to answer a few short answer questions. The interview itself was laid back. The questions were standard and I felt comfortable.
Interview Questions: Tell me about a time that you had an argument with a patient or colleague.

title: Recruiter Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 months. I interviewed at INTEGRIS Health (Oklahoma City, OK) in Feb 2020
Interview Descriptions: No follow up ever.  I had to reach out to receive any updates. Always told I was still actively in the process, but finally was ghosted. Months later I learned I was declined. Keep your candidates in the loop.
Interview Questions: Asked about my recruiting processes.

title: Physician Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 8 weeks. I interviewed at INTEGRIS Health (Oklahoma City, OK) in Dec 2019
Interview Descriptions: Formal, but a very relaxed experience. Each physician in the group took 15 minutes to sit down  one-on-one to get to know me. The physician group is looking to find the right personality to become a cohesive team member.
Interview Questions: What drew me to the specific speciality I was interviewing for?

title: RN Staff Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at INTEGRIS Health
Interview Descriptions: Interview was very appealing . how ever they treat their employee very poor. All their education all over place . no  class room education is avilavle in same institution i worked.
Interview Questions: what your contribution will for integris

title: Medical Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at INTEGRIS Health (Oklahoma City, OK) in Aug 2019
Interview Descriptions: They asked me very good questions. They were made to get to know me and how i dealt with patients. I overall think they were very good questions.  They made sure to include the LIVE LOVE LEARN
Interview Questions: Tell me about a time with a difficult patient and how you handled it,

title: Administrative Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. I interviewed at INTEGRIS Health
Interview Descriptions: Wonderful. HR department answered all of my questions and was extremely informative on all the necessary job duties that were required. Integris is a great company to work for!
Interview Questions: Just make sure you have what job skills they are asking for.

title: Biomedical Equipment Technician Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at INTEGRIS Health (Oklahoma City, OK) in May 2019
Interview Descriptions: Started with the manager explaining about the job, and followed by great interview questions assessing technical skills, personality and experience.  Towards the end of the interview I was  offered a tour around the facility.
Interview Questions: Tell me about an occasion where you proved your troubleshooting skills

title: Patient Access Coordinator Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 months. I interviewed at INTEGRIS Health (Miami, OK) in Dec 2018
Interview Descriptions: I had two interviews, with three of the current Integris workers in the registration department. I thought it was a good interview but waited for 2 months until I was given a job.
Interview Questions: Tell me about yourself. Tell me about a time that you had a difficult situation and how did you handle/resolve this?

title: Lpn Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at INTEGRIS Health (Oklahoma City, OK) in Oct 2018
Interview Descriptions: Laid back , more of them letting you know about the company and what the job description is. There was two people sitting in for the interview.  Good experience.
Interview Questions: Why I wanted to work for integris

title: RN, Bsn Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at INTEGRIS Health
Interview Descriptions: It went very quick. I received a call from the director of the floor, went in for the interview that day. She showed me around the unit after interviewing me then I received an email from HR within the next day or so with my offer.
Interview Questions: Where do you see yourself in the next 5 years?

title: Nurse Extern Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 months. I interviewed at INTEGRIS Health (Oklahoma City, OK) in Jul 2018
Interview Descriptions: I applied and received an interview in a timely manner. The process was smooth and I was asked approximately 20 questions regarding my values, history with conflict and delegation, and interprofessional relationships.
Interview Questions: What is one time you showed empathy instead of sympathy?

title: Front Desk Receptionist Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at INTEGRIS Health (Oklahoma City, OK) in May 2018
Interview Descriptions: The interview process was smooth, the interviewer was incredibly nice and did not bombard you questions. After speaking for a while, she gave a tour of the facility and proceeded to explain what the job consisted of in each floor of the building
Interview Questions: How have you handled disappointed/angry individuals before?

title: Medical Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at INTEGRIS Health
Interview Descriptions: Internal Applicants will be considered first.  Outside applicants apply on company website and are considered by Human Resources. One or two interviews may be conducted depending on whether the provider is available to meet with you.
Interview Questions: Why do you want to work for our company?

title: CNA Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1+ week. I interviewed at INTEGRIS Health (Oklahoma City, OK) in Dec 2017
Interview Descriptions: They were ask the basic questions how long have you been doing this job what do you have experience and are you willing to work long hours can you work long periods of time on your feet
Interview Questions: How well do you deal with stress?

title: Medical Assistant Float Pool Interview
Application Type: I applied through a recruiter. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at INTEGRIS Health (Oklahoma City, OK) in Nov 2017
Interview Descriptions: I had a meeting with two managers. They were both very kind and answered all my questions appropriately. Over all, it was very relaxed and both managers were very down to earth, yet professional.
Interview Questions: Can you travel?

title: CNA Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at INTEGRIS Health (Oklahoma City, OK) in Nov 2017
Interview Descriptions: I met with the unit director and basically just had a conversation. It was very personalized and nice. It didn't take too long after the interview to get started in orientation and the HR process was relatively easy.
Interview Questions: How do you handle conflict?

title: Certified Medical Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at INTEGRIS Health
Interview Descriptions: Had a fast interview with a main guy over the phone. Went into one place that approved my online app. Met with the manager, she liked me so she took me to meet the staff that I would be working with if hired. then she had me meet the drs I would be working with if hired. got called back 3 days later with a less than stellar offer of $11.
Interview Questions: What was a way you overcame adversity in the workplace at a prior job?

title: Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 days. I interviewed at INTEGRIS Health in Mar 2017
Interview Descriptions: First interview with director and manager went very well. They asked pertinent question in regard to the position. Second interview with manager and peers. Good questions. Environment was comfortable and professional.
Interview Questions: How would I handle a conflict with a coworker?

title: RN Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 5 days. I interviewed at INTEGRIS Health (Oklahoma City, OK) in Nov 2016
Interview Descriptions: I applied online and the next day I was called for an interview. My interview was scheduled for the next week. It was a one on one meeting with the charge nurse because the unit coordinator was held up in meetings. The charge nurse was very nice, asked a few questions and showed me the unit. The day after the interview I was called and offered the position.
Interview Questions: When was a time I went above and beyond for a patient?

title: Administrative Coordinator Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at INTEGRIS Health (Oklahoma City, OK) in Nov 2016
Interview Descriptions: I received a phone call and set up a day and time for the interview And 2 ladies interviewed me for two different positions we asked each other questions and I asked about goals and bonus the company might offer
Interview Questions: Do I know what an EOB is

title: Charge RN Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at INTEGRIS Health (Spencer, OK) in May 2016
Interview Descriptions: Was put in for a position I didn’t apply for!! I applied for an outpatient surgery position and got sent for a mental health position, I went because I needed the job. If you haven’t the experience the recruiters won’t even let the management decide if they want you!!
Interview Questions: My style of leadership

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. The process took 6 days. I interviewed at INTEGRIS Health (Oklahoma City, OK) in Jan 2016
Interview Descriptions: One interview with clinical director was the path I experienced. I had recommendations that fast-tracked the interview process, which is not the typical for the company. I then went through Human Resources and employee health to officially clear me prior to new employee orientation.
Interview Questions: No difficult questions.

title: Admission Access Coordinator Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at INTEGRIS Health
Interview Descriptions: The interview was with two of the department managers. It was a very friendly experience with honest answers to questions about wage, job prospects, advancement opportunity and when candidates would hear back about a job offer. It wasn't a critical interview but rather a conversation about what I would bring to the table and an overview of how the job worked on a daily basis. It was definitely an interview that wanted to identify how a new hire would fit into the team.
Interview Questions: Q: What experience or knowledge do you have of health insurance or admissions operations?

title: Exercise Specialist Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at INTEGRIS Health (Oklahoma City, OK)
Interview Descriptions: The interview process was all online to start with. Teh application process is simple and typical. You do have to create a log in to their online portal to submit your information. You can store your application for future job openings.
Interview Questions: What is your availability

title: Human Resources Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at INTEGRIS Health (Oklahoma City, OK)
Interview Descriptions: I was called and answered questions over the phone with a recruiter.  The hiring director called and discussed the position and asked me to come in for an interview.  After the director interview, I came back for a panel/peer interview and then came back a third time to visit with the director again, tour the offices and met the VP.
Interview Questions: behavioral and situational based questions

title: R N Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at INTEGRIS Health (Oklahoma City, OK) in Jun 2014
Interview Descriptions: After applying online and not getting a call back, I went to the HR and requested for a nurse recruiter to review my application. At which point she provided my application to the Emergency Department manager. The interview with the ED manager was easy, focused on my skills and ability to gain ED nurse skills. I was offered a position immediately.
Interview Questions: Tell us about work experience and training

title: Clinic Manager Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at INTEGRIS Health (Oklahoma City, OK) in May 2014
Interview Descriptions: The process was lengthy with no communications about the status of my application.  They use recruiters to screen the applicants and then refer qualified applicants to the hiring managers. Therefore, applicants are helpless to reach out to the manager.
Interview Questions: What kind of manager am I.

title: Certified Nursing Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at INTEGRIS Health in Mar 2014
Interview Descriptions: I was a brand new CNA when I applied. There were three people at the interview: The Clinical Director, one floor manager, and the staffing coordinator. They were super sweet, had been with the company for 10+ years and just made me feel really at ease. I was offered the job on the spot! I've been there for a year and absolutely love everyone I work with!
Interview Questions: What is your greatest strength?

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 5 weeks. I interviewed at INTEGRIS Health (Oklahoma City, OK) in Feb 2014
Interview Descriptions: Panel interview with Director and several staff members. The group was hesitant to ask questions, but had a prepared packet. It appeared they were not well prepared despite their paperwork. From the date of application to orientation day 1 was 35 days. It was 7 days before the recruiter called and then coordinating schedules took a few days. Once the offer was made, a drug test, background check and employee health screen took forever. While these are all standard...the process was more lengthy than I have experienced with other companies in the past.
Interview Questions: What one word describes your nursing style?

title: Patient Services Representative Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 months. I interviewed at INTEGRIS Health (Oklahoma City, OK) in Jan 2014
Interview Descriptions: The call back after applying seemed like it took about a month.  The interview process was pretty simple though.  I met with the direct supervisor and the manager over them.  I believe I got a call back within a day or two of the interview with a job offer.
Interview Questions: One thing they asked was how you handle a difficult situation such as an angry patient.

title: Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 5 weeks. I interviewed at INTEGRIS Health (Oklahoma City, OK) in Jun 2013
Interview Descriptions: Long! It takes quite awhile to go through the entire interview process. There are background checks, reference checks, educational verification, physical, drug test, TB test, flu shot. The entire process from the time I submitted my resume to the time I started on the job was about five weeks.
Interview Questions: Why do you want to work here?

title: Software Engineer Interview
Application Type: I applied through a recruiter. The process took 3 days. I interviewed at INTEGRIS Health (Oklahoma City, OK)
Interview Descriptions: I worked with a recruiter to get in contact with the lead architect at Integris. He asked fairly straight-forward questions relating to modern software development. Luckily, it was more of a conversation than being on a game show, which was nice for once.
Interview Questions: The questions were not always asked in a way that would direct you to what he was looking for. Got lucky with one about wrapping new behavior around existing code.

title: Director Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 months. I interviewed at INTEGRIS Health (Oklahoma City, OK) in Jul 2012
Interview Descriptions: They will call you for a phone interview.  It is mostly what you know and the skill set you have to fit the position.  If you are invited back you will then do an on site interview.
Interview Questions: Why do you want to work here?

title: CNA Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. The process took 3 days. I interviewed at INTEGRIS Health (Oklahoma City, OK) in Feb 2012
Interview Descriptions: Depends on what floor you are applying for. But every floor has a supervisor that performs the interview for the floor. For the floor I applied for the supervisor was very nice and very professional.
Interview Questions: How much experience do you have?

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at INTEGRIS Health (Oklahoma City, OK) in Mar 2011
Interview Descriptions: Applied online.  Had face to face interview with very simple questions.
Interview Questions: N/A

title: Nurse Extern Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 days. I interviewed at INTEGRIS Health in Apr 2010
Interview Descriptions: I submitted an online application and was called back for a phone interview the following day. A face to face interview the following day took place with the department nursing director. I was hired 2-3 days later. Upon hiring, I had to submit approval for a background check. It was just a simple background check using my SS#. I had an arrest that took place 6 years prior to that date, but since my charges were dismissed, the arrest was omitted and did not affect my employment. I had to complete an online HR protocol that involved information about HIPPA, blood borne pathogens, company policy, safety and security, etc. I believe it took a total of around 6 hours.
Interview Questions: N/A

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at INTEGRIS Health in May 2009
Interview Descriptions: Takes a very long time. Orientation is at least an 8 hour experience.
Interview Questions: Where do yo see yourself in 5 years?

title: Device Support Analyst Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. I interviewed at INTEGRIS Health in Feb 2009
Interview Descriptions: Hiring process was super snail pace slow took 2 months from start to first day on the job. Interview was good,, group interview, not many technical questions, more focused on personality to see how an individual fits into the TEAM environment.
Interview Questions: My weaknesses, everyone has an issue with that question, and what can you offer INTEGRIS.
